XXbsu007_u:2_0_0: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasamaye bhagavān sukhāvatyāṃ viharati sma mahatā bodhisattvasaṃghena
XXbsu007_u:2_0_1: sārdhaṃ - tadyathā avalokiteśvareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsthāmaprāptena
XXbsu007_u:2_0_2: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkaṃbhinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_0_3: kṣitigarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena samantabhadreṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_0_4: ākāśagarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vajrapāṇinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_0_5: sarvabhayahareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ sarvamaṅgaladhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_0_6: mahāsattvena sarvapuṇyalakṣaṇadhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena candrasūryatrailokyadhāriṇā
XXbsu007_u:2_0_7: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvatīrthamaṅgaladhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_0_8: maṃjuśriyā ca kumārabhūtena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃpramukhairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ /
XXbsu007_u:3_0: atha khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu007_u:3_3: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śatasahasraṃ pradakṣīṇīkṛtya sarvāṃśca tān sukhāvatīnivāsino bodhisattvān mahāsattvān śirasābhivandyaikānte nyaṣīdat /
XXbsu007_u:4_0_1: śriyaṃ mahādevīṃ dṛṣṭā mahābrahmasvareṇāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat /
XXbsu007_u:4_1_0: yaḥ kaścidavalokiteśvara rājā vā rājamātro vā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrā
XXbsu007_u:4_1_1: vā śriyā mahādevyā aṣṭottaraṃ śataṃ vimalaprakhyaṃ nāma stotraṃ dhārayiṣyanti tasya
XXbsu007_u:4_1_2: rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya viṣaye teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvabhayetyupadravā praśamiṣyanti /
XXbsu007_u:4_4: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya gṛhe śrīrnivasiṣyati /
XXbsu007_u:4_5: atha te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta /
XXbsu007_u:4_7: ye śriyā mahādevyā nāmadheyāni dhārayiṣyanti teṣāmapīmā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu007_u:5_2: bhagavānāha / gaṃgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāmantikāt śriyā mahādevyā kuśalamūlamavaropitam /
XXbsu007_u:5_3: bhūtapūrvamavalokiteśvara atīte 'dhvani ratnasaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau ratnakusumaguṇasāgaravaidūryakanakagirisuvarṇakāṃcanaprabhāsaśrīrnāma tathāgato loke udapādi /
XXbsu007_u:5_4: tasyāntike śriyā mahādevyā kuśalamūlamavaropitamanyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmantike /
XXbsu007_u:5_5: imāni ca tathāgatanāmāni tasyāḥ śriyā mahādevyāḥ kuśalamūlavivṛddhisaṃpattikarāṇi /
XXbsu007_u:5_6_0: sadānubaddhānitāni śriyā mahādevyā yānīha samudḥritāni sarvapāpaharāṇi sarvakilviṣanāśanāni
XXbsu007_u:6_36: imāni tathāgatanāmāni satkṛtya dhārayitavyāni vācayitavyāni evaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati /
XXbsu007_u:7_1: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ śrīmahādevī anāgate 'dhvani śrīmahāratnapratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau tatra śrīmaṇiratnasambhavo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyak sambuddhaḥ /
XXbsu007_u:7_3: [Śmdv_98] tatra ca lokadhātau sa eva tathāgata ālokakaro bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu007_u:7_4: te ca bodhisattvāstatra buddhakṣetre svayaṃprabhā bhaviṣyantyaparimitāyuṣaśca /
XXbsu007_u:7_6: ye ca bodhisattvāstatra buddhakṣetre upapatsyante sarve te padmakarkaṭikāsūpapatsyante /
XXbsu007_u:7_9_4: om sāvitrī dhātrī mātā caturvedaśrīḥ lakṣmīḥ bhūtamātā jayā vijayā gaṅgā sarvatīrthā
XXbsu007_u:7_9_5: sarvamaṅgalyā vimalanirmalakaraśrīḥ sarvapāpahantrī nirmadakarā candraśrīḥ sūryaśrīḥ
XXbsu007_u:7_9_7: padmālayā padmadharā padmāvatī anekaratnāṃśumālā dhanadā śvetā mahāśvetā śvetabhujā
XXbsu007_u:7_9_9: śatasahasraśirā [Śmdv_99] vividhavicitramaṇimaulidharā surūpā viśvarūpā yaśā mahāyaśā
XXbsu007_u:7_9_10: saumyā bahujīmūtā pavitrakeśā candrakāntā sūryakāntā śubhā śubhakartrī sarvasattvābhimukhī
XXbsu007_u:7_9_14: dātrī bhoktrī tejā tejovatī vibhūtīḥ samṛddhiḥ vivṛddhiḥ unnatiḥ dharmaśrīḥ mādhavāśrayā
XXbsu007_u:7_9_15: kusumanilayā anasūyā puruṣakārāśrayā sarvapavitragātrā maṅgalahastā sarvālakṣmīnāśayitrī
XXbsu007_u:7_9_17: dyutiḥ pramodabhāgyalolā sarvarṣipavitraśrīḥ sarvaśrīḥ bhavajyeṣṭhottamaśrīḥ sarvakinnarasarvasūryottamaśrīḥ
XXbsu007_u:7_10: om vilokaya tāraya mocaya mama sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ sarvapuṇyasambhārānāmukhīkuru svāhā /
XXbsu007_u:7_14: brahmaṇe svāhā / viṣṇave svāhā / rudrāya svāhā / viśvamukhāya svāhā / om nigrigrini sarvakāryasādhani sini sini āvāhayāmi
XXbsu007_u:7_16: sarvapuṇyākarṣaṇyai svāhā / śrīdevatākarṣaṇyai svāhā / sarvapāpanāśanyai svāhā / sarvālakṣmīpraśamanyai svāhā /
XXbsu007_u:7_20: siṃhavāhinyai svāhā / padmasaṃbhūtāyai svāhā / sarvakṛtyakākhordavināśanyai svāhā /
XXbsu007_u:7_21_0: imāni tānyabhayāvalokiteśvaraśriyā mahādevyā nāmāni sarvakilviṣanāśanāni sarvapāpavidhvaṃsanakarāṇi
XXbsu007_u:7_22_0: yaḥ kaścidvārayiṣyati imāni tathāgatanāmāni kalyamutthāya śucinā sarvabuddhānāṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ
XXbsu007_u:7_22_1: dattvā śriyai mahādevyai candanadhūpaṃ dattvā vācayitavyāni sarvaśriyamadhigamiṣyati
XXbsu007_u:8_1: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan /
